name: Poyfai Malaiporn
description: '''Poyfai Malaiporn''' (also spelled '''Poifai''' and '''Poifhai''', {{Langx|th|ปอยฝ้าย มาลัยพร}}, {{RTGS|'''Poifai Malaiphon'''}}, born 14 January 1971 in [[Fao Rai District]], [[Nong Khai Province]], [[Thailand]]) is a Thai [[luk thung]] and [[mor lam]] singer.
